review: Dr Sushanta has been giving consultancy to my son  from first day, and  he is explaining things for new born baby in simple and good manner , he explained us everything to choose all vaccination for my son.Nice Person !! Giving best treatment  and listening to your child problem and trying to help best !!  very experienced and Nice doctor for new born babies. Giving suggestions for new baby diet and whenever we need consultancy he is available most of the time. Thanks to you !!
** ******* ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ******* *** ** *** ***** He is been a guiding hand over the calls and SMSs too in emergency. I highly recommend Dr. Susanta.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sushanta has been supportive since the day my girl was born. She was a low birth weight kid but he assured us all the time abt her health n development. She is today gaining nicely. 
He explained us in detail abt the vaccination to take a decision. He has been available on call for emergencies. I would recommend him for new moms if they wana change their pediatrician.
